description: Full Stack Developer skilled in MERN stack, experienced in building scalable web apps with clean code and performance focus.
Experienced in frontend (JavaScript, React, Next), backend (Node.js, Express), databases (MySQL, MongoDB), and tools (Git, Postman).
6 years in IT including roles from Junior Analyst to Senior Technical Consultant across QA, development, and leadership in companies like Infoview Technologies and Perficient India.
Bachelor's degree in Software Development from St. Joseph's College, Trichy, awarded Gold Medal for academic excellence.
